full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB MNGA' GSOL NI, ,LHA RGYAL SNYAN PA'I RNGA GSANG DANG, ,PAn CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS RGYAN GYIS, ,MDZAD PA'I BEG TZE'I MNGA' GSOL BZHUGS SO, , *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI MNGA' GSOL LHA RGYAL SNYAN PA'I RNGA GSANG ZHES BYA BA NI,
